SELECT DISTINCT
RAM.DEVICE_RAM_CAPACITY
CAP.CAPACITY_TYPE
DISP.DEVICE_DISPLAY_SIZE
FROM DEVICE D JOIN RAM ON D.DEVICE_RAM_CODE = RAM.DEVICE_RAM_CODE LEFT JOIN DISPLAY DISP ON D.DEVICE_DISPLAY_CODE = DISP.DEVICE_DISPLAY_CODE LEFT JOIN CAPACITY_PRICE CP ON D.DEVICE_NO = CP.DEVICE_NO LEFT JOIN CAPACITY CAP ON CP.CAPACITY_NUMBER = CAP.CAPACITY_NUMBER WHERE
RAM.DEVICE_RAM_CAPACITY IS NOT NULL
CAP.CAPACITY_TYPE IS NOT NULL
DISP.DEVICE_DISPLAY_SIZE IS NOT NULL
SELECT DEVICE_NO, DEVICE_NAME, DEVICE_IMG FROM DEVICE WHERE DEVICE_BRAND = #{category} ORDER BY DEVICE_RELEASE_DATE DESC
SELECT DEVICE_NO, DEVICE_IMG, DEVICE_NAME, DEVICE_BUYING_PRICE FROM DEVICE WHERE DEVICE_BRAND = #{brand} ORDER BY DEVICE_RELEASE_DATE DESC
SELECT DEVICE_NO, DEVICE_NAME, DEVICE_IMG FROM DEVICE WHERE DEVICE_BRAND = #{category} ORDER BY DEVICE_RELEASE_DATE DESC
